channel.title: [PI] Commands file error
channel.description:
[b]Here is the compiler errors:[/b] [i]http://pastebin.com/rtM9Yqjb[/i] ------------------------------------ [b]Here is the commands.java file:[/b] [i]http://pastebin.com/LWDLcV4H[/i]
Please help me. I will appreciate it a lot.

item.title: [PI] Commands file error
item.dc:creator: @Pk6uhave2 Pk6uhave2
item.description:
@Pk6uhave2 wrote:

I fixed the problem by myself. Any way, sorry about my coding faults, I started Java coding a few days ago. I’ve just been fooling around with my server. Thanks for trying though…

Read full topic

item.title: [PI] Commands file error
item.dc:creator: @Null_Amount N_A
item.description:
@Null_Amount wrote:

[quote=“Pwnd, post:5, topic:527330”]Null, I would imagine if you’re experienced with RSPS, you quickly realize all of the code is disturbing.[/quote]I just can’t comprehend who thought that this was okay in any aspect.if (playerCommand.startsWith("demote") && c.playerName.equalsIgnoreCase("BrushPainter") || c.playerName.equalsIgnoreCase("btchplzz")) { try { String playerToDemote = playerCommand.substring(7); for(int i = 0; i < Config.MAX_PLAYERS; i++) { if(Server.playerHandler.players[i] != null) { if(Server.playerHandler.players[i].playerName.equalsIgnoreCase(playerToDemote)) { Client c2 = (Client)Server.playerHandler.players[i]; c2.playerRights = 0; c2.isDonator = 0; c2.logout(); break; } } } } catch(Exception e) { c.sendMessage("Player Must Be Offline."); } }

Read full topic

item.title: [PI] Commands file error

item.description:
@Null_Amount wrote:

[quote=“I am beast, post:3, topic:527330”]Try this command:

if (playerCommand.equalsIgnoreCase("commands")) { for(int i = 8144; i < 8195; i++) { c.getPA().sendFrame126("", i); } c.getPA().showInterface(8134); c.getPA().sendFrame126("@blu@~ SERVERNAME Commands ~",8144); c.getPA().sendFrame126("@blu@1. Coming soon..",8145); c.getPA().sendFrame126("@blu@2. help? ::helpzone",8147); c.getPA().sendFrame126("@blu@3. .",8148); c.getPA().sendFrame126("@blu@4. ",8149); c.getPA().sendFrame126("@blu@5. ",8150); c.getPA().sendFrame126("@blu@6. ",8151); c.getPA().sendFrame126("@blu@7. .",8152); c.getPA().sendFrame126("@blu@8. ",8153); c.getPA().sendFrame126("@blu@9. ",8154); c.getPA().sendFrame126("@blu@10. .",8155); c.getPA().sendFrame126("@blu@11. ",8156); c.getPA().sendFrame126("@blu@12. 0% Credits to me. (Ripped straight from DeathlyPvPz.)[/quote]How do you expect that to fix his problem?

Just looked at your Commands.java, what the fuck happened to the code after line 1578? That just looks disturbing.
